interfaces.name: AS_CO_CPS_cancelSaveButtons
interfaces.description: Section with cancel and save buttons

interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_FM_addDocumentDetails

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getUserLocale
expression_rules.description: Gets the Appian user locale as defined in the user preferences, returns the default if the user is null

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  userlocale(ri!user)
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel
expression_rules.description: Retrieves a single label from the Common Objects bundle file

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle(
    bundleFolder: cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
    bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
    arguments: ri!arguments,
    localeAgnostic: false
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle(
    bundleFolder: cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
    bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
    arguments: ri!arguments,
    localeAgnostic: false
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
expression_rules.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(

    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),

    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),

    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
  
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    
    local!i18nData: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
      bundleFolder: ri!bundleFolder,
      bundleNames: local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName,
      localeAgnostic: ri!localeAgnostic
    ),
    
    rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
expression_rules.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_displayDynamicLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label for the input key based on the properties file for GSS

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
    local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
    rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  a!localVariables(
    local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null()),
    rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle:  local!bundle,
      bundleKey: ri!bundleKey,
      arguments: ri!arguments
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
expression_rules.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

test_cases.test_name: Sample Locale Agnostic with Bundle Names
Sample Locale Agnostic without Bundle Names

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
expression_rules.description: Returns the standard labelPosition based on the context of the component, allows for custom input

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_loadBundleByNames
expression_rules.description:
Loads a bundle file from passed in bundle names

Documentation is available for this design object

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
data.definition:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
expression_rules.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
expression_rules.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

test_cases.test_name: EXCEPTION: It is not possible to have a test case with assertion for this rule

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey
expression_rules.description: Parses a bundle key and returns a dictionary of the `bundleName` & `labelKey`

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
expression_rules.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_VD_textValidation
expression_rules.description: Performs minimum and maximum length validation on a text value. Returns a validation message if any provided length constraints are violated. Allows for custom validation messages.

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  not(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!input))
)

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL
constants.description: CANCEL.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Cancel" action

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_PARAGRAPH_LENGTH_SHORT
constants.description: 255 - SHORT length for paragraph fields, used for validations and trimming text

constants.name: AS_GSS_FLD_PROPERTIES_FILES
constants.description: Points to the GSS Properties Files Folder

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_SAVE
constants.description: SAVE.USER_ACTION - Value to use to drive process logic after a user performs a "Save" action
